author: Dirección de Estudios Económicos
name: agroindustria-ganaderia---indicadores-economicos-bovinos
notes: Precios de los siguientes insumos y productos ganaderos bovinos: ternero, novillo, maíz, vaca conserva, vaquillona, dólar, Indice de precios mayoristas. También se incluyen relaciones insumo/producto y márgenes brutos de las principales actividades ganaderas bovinas.

organization.name: agroindustria
organization.title: Ministerio de Agricultura, Ganadería y Pesca

resources.attributesDescription: [{"type": "integer", "description": "a\u0144o", "title": "anio"}, {"type": "integer", "description": "mes", "title": "mes"}, {"type": "number", "description": "ternero($/kg)", "title": "ternero($/kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "novillo($/kg)", "title": "novillo($/kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "dolar($/U$S)", "title": "dolar($/U$S)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "IPIM", "title": "IPIM"}, {"type": "number", "description": "maiz($/ton)", "title": "maiz($/ton)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "salario($/mes)", "title": "salario($/mes)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "vaca_conserva($/kg)", "title": "vaca_conserva($/kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "vaquillona_pre\u0144ada($/ cab)", "title": "vaquillona_preniada($/ cab)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "maiz(kg)/novillo(kg)", "title": "maiz(kg)/novillo(kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "ternero(kg)/novillo(kg)", "title": "ternero(kg)/novillo(kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "salario_mensual($)/ternero(kg)", "title": "salario_mensual($)/ternero(kg)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "vaquillona(cab)/vaca conserva(cab)", "title": "vaquillona(cab)/vaca conserva(cab)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "cria_c.salado($/ha)", "title": "cria_c.salado($/ha)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "invernada_subhumeda_alta_prod.($/ha)", "title": "invernada_subhumeda_alta_prod.($/ha)"}, {"type": "number", "description": "feed lot($/ha", "title": "feed lot($/ha"}]
